name: Citizens Financial Group, Inc.
description: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. is one of the nation's largest publicly traded banks, providing a wide range of financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Founded in 1828 and headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, the company operates approximately 1,000 branches and 3,200 ATMs across 11 states. Citizens is committed to delivering a superior banking experience through digital innovation and personalized service. The bank offers a comprehensive array of products and services, including personal banking, business banking, wealth management, and commercial banking solutions. With a focus on customer service, Citizens strives to help its clients achieve their financial goals through innovative solutions tailored to their needs. The bank has received numerous awards for its commitment to customer satisfaction and has made significant investments in technology to enhance its digital offerings. Citizens also emphasizes community involvement and has initiatives aimed at supporting local businesses and promoting economic development. The company is dedicated to sustainable practices and corporate responsibility, reflecting its mission to build a better bank for its customers and communities.

seo.meta_title: Citizens Financial Group, Inc. | Comprehensive Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Citizens Financial Group, Inc., one of the largest banks in the U.S., offering personal and business banking services, wealth management, and community support.

faq.question: What services does Citizens Financial Group offer?
faq.answer: Citizens Financial Group offers personal banking, business banking, wealth management, and commercial banking services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Citizens Financial Group?
faq.answer: Bruce Van Saun is the CEO of Citizens Financial Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Citizens Financial Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Citizens Financial Group is headquartered in Providence, Rhode Island, USA.

faq.question: When was Citizens Financial Group founded?
faq.answer: Citizens Financial Group was founded in 1828.
